questions.question: This term refers to the process of identifying, investigating, and responding to security incidents.
This phase of the incident response process involves preparing for potential security incidents by establishing policies and procedures.
This term refers to the practice of containing and mitigating the impact of a security incident.
This phase of the incident response process involves identifying the root cause of a security incident and taking steps to prevent its recurrence.
This term refers to the practice of restoring normal operations after a security incident has been resolved.
